# Celestial (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Domiel]], [[Pistis Sophia]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain the supernatural ability to smite evil once per day. Add a +4 bonus to your melee attack roll and your cleric level to your damage. You must declare the smite before making the attack, and the attempt is wasted if the target is not evil.

**Celestial Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Vision of Heaven (Spell)|Vision of Heaven]]****:** Evil creature is [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round.

**2** **[[Consecrate (Spell)|Consecrate]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Fills area with positive energy, making undead weaker.

   **[[Commune with Lesser Spirit (Spell)|Commune with Lesser Spirit]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Lesser spirit creature answers one question/two levels.

**3** **[[Blessed Sight (Spell)|Blessed Sight]]****:** Evil auras become visible to you.

**  ** **[[Substitution (Spell)|Substitution]]****:** Half the damage you take is transferred to a figure of a spirit or deity.

**4** **[[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|Lesser Planar Ally]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

**  ** **[[Spirit Ally, Lesser (Spell)|Spirit Ally, Lesser]]****:** Exchange services with an 8 HD spirit.

**5** **[[Heavenly Lightning (Spell)|Heavenly Lightning]]****:** Arcs of radiant lightning deal 3d6 damage to one target per two caster levels.

**  ** **[[Commune with Greater Spirit (Spell)|Commune with Greater Spirit]]** **<sup>MX</sup>:** Any spirit creature answers one question/level.

**6** **[[Call Faithful Servants (Spell)|Call Faithful Servants]]****:** Summons 1d4 lantern archons, coure eladrins, or musteval guardinals.

**   Spirit Ally:** As *[[Spirit Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser spirit ally]]*, but up to 16 HD.

**7** **[[Heavenly Lightning Storm (Spell)|Heavenly Lightning Storm]]****:** Arcs of radiant lightning deal 5d6 damage to one target per level.

**8** **[[Holy Aura (Spell)|Holy Aura]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** +4 AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil spells.

   **[[Spirit Ally, Greater (Spell)|Spirit Ally, Greater]]****:** As *[[Spirit Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser spirit ally]]*, but up to 24 HD.

**9** **[[Gate (Spell)|Gate]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.


| **Source:** | Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 86 |
|---|---|
| | Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 86 |
